footer.tagline: Redefining hospitality through carefully curated boutique experiences that connect travelers with the authentic spirit of each destination.

hero.heading: UPGRADE YOUR NEXT STAY
hero.subheading: Experience charming boutique accommodations near the ocean

introduction.heading: REDEFINING HOSPITALITY
introduction.body: At Silver Pineapple, we believe that every journey deserves an extraordinary destination. Our carefully curated collection of boutique properties offers more than just a place to rest— we provide immersive experiences that connect you with the authentic spirit of each location.

discoverLocation.mainHeading: DISCOVER EAU GALLIE & THE SPACE COAST
discoverLocation.introText: Your gateway to Florida's vibrant arts scene, pristine beaches, and legendary space exploration
discoverLocation.welcome: Welcome to Eau Gallie, Melbourne's creative heart. Named for the colorful coquina rocks found in the shallow waters, this historic riverfront neighborhood has evolved into one of Florida's most vibrant arts communities.
discoverLocation.fromDoorstep: From your doorstep, wander the Eau Gallie Arts District with its 30+ outdoor murals, 50+ galleries and boutiques, craft breweries like Intracoastal Brewing Company, and waterfront dining. Cross the scenic causeway to reach pristine Atlantic beaches in just 10-15 minutes, or venture north to witness rocket launches from Kennedy Space Center.
discoverLocation.whetherHere: Whether you're here for art walks and live music, dolphin watching on the Indian River Lagoon, or exploring the Space Coast's natural beauty, Eau Gallie offers the perfect base for an unforgettable Florida experience.
discoverLocation.ready: Ready to experience the best of Florida's Space Coast?

nature.description: Indian River Lagoon home to 700+ dolphins, sea turtle nesting beaches, and scenic trails

space.title: Space Exploration
space.description: Kennedy Space Center just 50 minutes north - witness launches from the Space Coast

nightlife.title: Nightlife & Events
nightlife.description: Live music, weekly art walks, and year-round festivals in a walkable historic district

hero.heading: Our Accommodations
hero.subheading: Find Your Perfect Home Away From Home

rooms.introduction: Each of our thoughtfully designed accommodations combines the comfort of home with the luxury of a boutique hotel. Whether you're staying for business or pleasure, our spaces are crafted to provide an exceptional experience that exceeds your expectations.

amenities.heading: Included Amenities
amenities.subheading: Practical comforts across all Silver Pineapple stays

hero.heading: About Silver Pineapple
hero.subheading: Short stays, local charm — steps from the Eau Gallie Public Library.

introduction.heading: Two Buildings. One Backyard. All Welcome.
introduction.paragraph1: Silver Pineapple is a pair of friendly, locally managed buildings that share a sunny backyard — a simple, comfortable home base for short stays, work trips, and seasonal escapes in the heart of Eau Gallie.
introduction.paragraph2: We keep things easy: renovated units, on-site laundry, and hassle-free parking. Step outside and you're beside the Eau Gallie Public Library and a walkable arts district full of color, coffee, galleries, and river breezes.
introduction.paragraph3: Our goal is neighborly hospitality — clear communication, practical comforts, and a real connection to the neighborhood so you can live like a local from day one.

founder.heading: How We Operate
founder.body: Silver Pineapple is locally managed by a small, hands-on team. We value clear communication, quick responses, and the kind of thoughtful touches that make short stays feel effortless. While we keep a low profile, we're always nearby when you need us a friendly, reliable, and committed to a great experience.

philosophy.heading: What We Value
philosophy.subheading: Four simple pillars that guide every stay at Silver Pineapple.

comfort.title: Comfort & Convenience
comfort.description: Renovated, practical spaces with on-site laundry and easy parking — the essentials handled so you can relax.

seamless.title: Seamless Stays
seamless.description: Simple bookings, clear communication, and flexible short-term or seasonal options for stress-free travel.

local.title: Local Connection
local.description: Live steps from the Eau Gallie Public Library, murals, galleries, coffee, and riverfront parks in Melbourne's arts district.

trusted.title: Trusted Hospitality
trusted.description: Friendly, responsive, locally based management focused on cleanliness, comfort, and a worry-free stay.

location.heading: Discover Eau Gallie
location.paragraph1: Welcome to Melbourne's creative heart. From our doorstep beside the Eau Gallie Public Library, you can wander a walkable district filled with colorful murals, independent galleries, cozy cafés, and breezy riverfront parks — with the Atlantic beaches just a quick drive over the causeway.
location.paragraph2: Whether you're here for a few nights or a few months, Eau Gallie offers an easy rhythm of art, markets, live music, and waterfront sunsets — the perfect base for Space Coast adventures.

arts.title: Arts & Murals
arts.description: EGAD's open-air art scene with galleries, studios, and 30+ murals a short walk away.

dining.title: Dining & Drinks
dining.description: Rooftops, waterfront seafood, craft brews, and local coffee — all nearby.

parks.title: River & Parks
parks.description: Ballard Park boat ramp, Eau Gallie Pier, and green spaces for sunrise walks.

beach.title: Beach & Access
beach.description: Beaches in ~10–15 min via Eau Gallie Causeway; quick routes to US-1, I-95, and MLB airport.

cta.heading: Ready to Experience Our Space?
cta.body: Tell us your dates and what you need we'll help you plan a comfortable short stay at Silver Pineapple.

stats.heading: TRUSTED ACROSS ALL PLATFORMS
stats.body: Our commitment to excellence is reflected in our consistent ratings across all major booking platforms. Every review represents a real guest experience and our dedication to hospitality.
